tool_description: Find nearby Tesla Superchargers globally, allowing Tesla owners to locate charging stations efficiently.

api_list.name: Nearby superchargers
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of Tesla Superchargers located within a specified radius, up to 50 kilometers away.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the user's location.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the user's location.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The search radius in kilometers. Default is 25 km, maximum is 50 km.
